conbody.p: Microsoft Security Essential (MSE) is the anti-virus software built into the system to prevent malicious intrusion and protect data security.

When the computer is connected to a network system without security certification, the computer may be at risk of being infected by computer viruses or other destructive software. This system prevents virus infection through the use of MSE anti-virus software.

li.p: MSE takes a series of measures to protect data security and prevent malicious intrusion of computer viruses.
To find and remove viruses effectively, MSE can be configured to periodically scan documents and data from the operating system and medical imaging post-processing system.
MSE will perform virus detection on data entering the medical imaging post-processing system.
MSE will automatically scan and detect the USB storage devices inserted into USB interfaces of the system.
MSE performs virus detection when the user inserts a USB memory or CD/DVD into the system. If any virus is found, a window pops up to notify the user.

The customer service engineer will establish a virus scanning policy for the user according to specific service conditions.

li.p: Data communication can only be performed in the defined ways. All unnecessary ports or channels are locked.

conbody.p: Since MSE has regularly scheduled scanning according to the actual conditions of a user,the system operation may be slightly slower while scanning for and removing viruses. However, this will not influence the normal operations of the system.

In order to deal with new types of viruses, the virus database needs to be upgraded. If the database is not updated regularly, MSE may be unable to find and prevent certain new types of viruses. According to user requirements, the customer service engineer will help upgrade the virus database. In most cases, it is not recommended that the user upgrades the virus database. This is because upgrading the virus database without strict testing may result in unexpected problems and/or failure of the product.

li.p: The anti-virus software keeps running by default to monitor and keep the security of the operation system.It is recommended that user triggers the full scan periodically at system idle time.
The system may be updated with security patch for anti-virus after UIH's evaluation based on threatening level.
The user should regularly check whether the anti-virus software is running. If the software does not work, please contact UIH customer service engineers.
By default, firewall is open for domain network, public network and private network.Call service in case of the requirement for modification.
